thread.title: After Seeing This Woman's Ingenious Mental Health Tracker, You'll Want to Make 1 For Yourself
thread.title_full: After Seeing This Woman's Ingenious Mental Health Tracker, You'll Want to Make 1 For Yourself

author: Macy Williams
title: After Seeing This Woman's Ingenious Mental Health Tracker, You'll Want to Make 1 For Yourself
text:
After Seeing This Woman's Ingenious Mental Health Tracker, You'll Want to Make 1 For Yourself February 6, 2017 by Macy Williams 359 Shares 
When Markale walked into his sister Kyra's room, he was surprised by what he saw. Taped on her mirror was a day-to-day tracker of her moods and feelings. Walked in my sister room and saw this pic.twitter.com/O0JbvkaI1s 
â€” Saint Pablo (@TheLifeOfKale) February 2, 2017 
After posting it on Twitter, it went viral, gaining thousands of reactions. It's a great way to practice self-care , and to keep in touch with where you're at mentally and emotionally each day. Check out some of the responses the original tweet got; many people are inspired to try this method for themselves. @TheLifeOfKale that's gonna be dope when the year is over
